query.oql: select A.name from authors A order by A.name
query.qrawl: select A.name from authors A order by A.name

query.oql: select A.name from authors A order by A.name ASC
query.qrawl: select A.name from authors A order by A.name ASC

query.oql: select A.name from authors A order by A.name DESC
query.qrawl: select A.name from authors A order by A.name DESC
